sentences.english: I also believe an attack on a us carrier with a strategic missle would lead to nuclear retaliation.
sentences.chinese: 我也相信用戰略導彈攻擊美國航母會導致覈報復。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the design of insurance company underwriting system.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了保險公司覈保核賠系統的設計。

sentences.english: I would focus on the core problem.
sentences.chinese: 我會把焦點放在覈心問題上。

sentences.english: It would give terrorists a nuclear umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 它會給恐怖分子一把覈保護傘。

sentences.english: Policy effective date subject to underwriting acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 保單生效日期須經覈保審批。

sentences.english: Abolishment of "nuclear umbrella " and "nuclear sharing" policies and practices.
sentences.chinese: 應廢除“覈保護傘”和“核共享”的政策與實踐。

sentences.english: In fact, many states rely on “nuclear umbrellas” provided by their allied nuclear-armed states.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，許多國家依靠其有核盟國提供“覈保護傘”。

sentences.english: The first is to make clear the core indicators of electronic police and comparison.
sentences.chinese: 首先是要明確電子警察覈心指標，進行比較。

sentences.english: Your supervisor sometimes permits you to infringe the underwriting guide line.
sentences.chinese: 您的主管有時候允許您違背覈保準則。

sentences.english: Your request for the loan of additional personnel is still under consideration for appropriate action.
sentences.chinese: 你請求借用增加人員一案，正在覈辦中。

definition: to carry on/to succeed (of a familial line)/to inherit
belly/skin/to state/to pass on information/to display
